data.name: Concordia: Digital Edition - Venus
data.detailed_description:
This expansion contains two additional maps - Ionium and Hellas - and a new team game mode that all add variety and new challenges to the game:

  • ‚öñÔ∏è Venus offers players a team variant of classic Concordia for 4 to 6 players divided into teams of two. The team partners win and lose together and are affected by each other‚Äôs actions.
  • üó∫Ô∏è Ionium is a map with two variants - a large 30 City map and a small 22 City map, which introduces a land bridge between the ancient cities of Brundisium and Apollonia; Land Colonists can cross it, but can not stay on that connection.
  • üåø Hellas is a medium-sized map with 25 Cities and 10 Provinces and no additional rules.

Partner up and re-discover Concordia today!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1707532/Concordia_Digital_Edition__Venus/
data.about_the_game:
This expansion contains two additional maps - Ionium and Hellas - and a new team game mode that all add variety and new challenges to the game:

  • ‚öñÔ∏è Venus offers players a team variant of classic Concordia for 4 to 6 players divided into teams of two. The team partners win and lose together and are affected by each other‚Äôs actions.
  • üó∫Ô∏è Ionium is a map with two variants - a large 30 City map and a small 22 City map, which introduces a land bridge between the ancient cities of Brundisium and Apollonia; Land Colonists can cross it, but can not stay on that connection.
  • üåø Hellas is a medium-sized map with 25 Cities and 10 Provinces and no additional rules.

Partner up and re-discover Concordia today!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1707532/Concordia_Digital_Edition__Venus/
data.short_description: An official DLC to Concordia: Digital Edition adding two new maps - Ionium and Hellas - and a new two-player team mode - all of which will add variety and new challenges to your games!
data.supported_languages: English, French, German, Polish, Italian, Japanese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 64 bit
  • Processor: Dual Core 1.6 GHz or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 450 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.9+
  • Processor: Dual Core 1.6 GHz or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 450 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
